passage_text: Procedures can be performed at a fraction of the amount you would spend on the same procedure in the US or Europe. For example, the average surgeon's fee for eyelid surgery in the U.S. is $2,500 and in the Philippines, a qualified surgeon will charge only $600 to $1,500. For liposuction, surgeon's fees in the U.S. average $2,000 per area. In the Philippines, it is around $800 for the first area and $500 for succeeding areas. Rhinoplasty is a plastic surgery procedure that re-shapes the outside of the nose to provide better balance with the rest of the face. Rhinoplasty, or plastic surgery of the nose, is one of the most popular cosmetic surgery procedures. The nose occupies the prominent central area of the face, and thus determines to a major extent whether the face is considered attractive or not.
